title: HPE security advisory (AV25-597)
description: On September 16, 2025, HPE published a security advisory to address vulnerabilities in the following products:
products: HPE Aruba Networking EdgeConnect SD-WAN Release Stream  versions 9.5.x.x to 9.5.3.x
HPE Aruba Networking EdgeConnect SD-WAN Release Stream  versions 9.4.x.x to 9.4.3.x
solution: Review the references and apply the necessary updates.
